website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for fans of fantasy TV.
pros: Hand-painted ceramic is 9.5-inches tall and full of detail
cons: Claims to be weatherproof but some felt it was more suited to a protected area

customer_reviews.title: You know you want it
customer_reviews.text: My dad slipped up one day and told me gnomes scare him. What does the best daughter in the world do? Sends him a new funny gnome every month. He’s a state away, so amazon makes this an easy transaction. BEST DAUGHTER EVER. I am just going to copy & paste this review on the other ones I have already purchased. Side note: I have a bunch of them in my “save for later” cart. That is how much of a riot they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend of mine's boyfriend last Christmas, they both are crazy for GOT. He liked it.....later on my friend and him broke up because he is a loser, she took the gnome. I think that shows that this is the perfect gift for GOT fans. So perfect that my friend said "eff you I'm taking the gnome" Can you think of something you have given to someone that has showed that much appreciation?
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a couple who has a very large garden and also loves game of thrones. It was a great gift! They loved it. The gnome itself is decent sized (normal garden gnome size, not too small and not too big). The packaging was great. The figure itself was sturdy and well made. Like there were no odd paint lines or anything. The "swords" on the throne are actually garden tools, which I didn't realized when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and I love it! It looks great, and the paint job is spot on. My only concern is how light it is. I wish it were a little heavier so I wouldn’t have to worry about it tipping over when there’s heavy winds. (Hasn’t happened, just worried it might.). It’s made of some kind of resin, so I’m assuming it’s not easily breakable. Overall, I love it! It would make a great gift for your favorite GOT fan!
customer_reviews.author: daUPhere

customer_reviews.title: My love for Game of Thrones in a gnome
customer_reviews.text: I love Game of Thrones and saw this item last year and did not think it was real so I finally decided to find it and low and behold it is on Amazon! I needed this for my garden/landscaping. I didn't care the price, It was being bought! The only downside to this item is its weight...I really thought this would be alot heavier and it is very light, so I have to make sure I put this on the ground so it doesn't fall and break. Love this Gnome! I might be a Gnome collector after this, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You won't want it to get dirty!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this item that words cannot do justice. I wrote to them stating "no dragon!" What about "Dany?" No reply!!! I loved my first one so much I had to get one as a gift! Wish I had my dragon and a Sansa! I hope you will like yours as much as I love mine. Please share the love. Thanks my fellow gamers!
customer_reviews.author: Happy B.

customer_reviews.title: Time to build the gnome garden
customer_reviews.text: My husband always wanted a "gnarly, crabby looking gnome" to hide in our hibiscus bushes. I finally found the perfect gnome! I lost him 4 years ago, so the gnome garden will now be a memorial garden, but I know this would make him laugh like crazy!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have this outside in my garden and I've had it for a few months now. We've had sever rain and extreme heat and it doesn't even seem to be fading. My dogs have knocked it over a few times also and it still looks good. Cool little gnome.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Homage to GOT/gnome fans
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Game of Thrones fan and this is the cutest way to feature the show. I love how they used gnome tools for the iron throne. Love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: dia daze

customer_reviews.title: Here thar be Gnomes.
customer_reviews.text: This was much lighter than I had expected. It appears to be hollow inside, which makes it easy to move around and adjust. It also means it might be more structurally likely to break, but only time will tell. My sister, whom this was a gift for, absolutely loved this. I recommend playing the game of thrones theme when you open it up. I knocked off a star for packaging, the plastic front had become flimsy and made it seem cheaper than what it was. This is merely cosmetic on packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the garden.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother in law as she loves having her gnomes "protecting" her garden and her and her husband watch Game of Thrones a lot. She absolutely loved it! It's very well made and has not been damaged from the weather the entire time it has been outside. Definitely a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Angel H.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. I plan on ordering one for myself ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Mother in-law for Mothers Day. She loved it. I plan on ordering one for myself soon as well. Any Game of Thrones fan will love this. Even if you are not a gardener, or even have a yard.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Moniz

customer_reviews.title: Paint is not gloss as appears in photo.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller and more toy like than the other gnomes I have so disappointed. But should have looked more carefully as other than being dull vs glossy it’s the same as picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a White Elephant gift exchange
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work Christmas part and it was perfect. Many of my coworkers are Game of Thrones fans and this was a hit! It is not too bulky or big.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: A great way to Bring the “Game” to the backyard garden
customer_reviews.text: A Gnome-ister always pays his debts. Just wondering if there’s a missing gnome who may be buried under the Iron Throne.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for our garden❤️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gnome for any Game of Thrones fan! Great quality, good price and fast shipping. I would definitely recommend this for any fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend. It came as described and she loved it. It is very lightweight and has a great design. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey HochstetterTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.text: I love my Game of Gnomes garden statue. It goes great with my dragon! Liked it so much, I bought another one for my Game of Thrones buddy for his garden! Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea

customer_reviews.title: Lots of laughs for a little gnome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad. He is a huge GOT fan. He laughed so hard when he opened it, it was great. It is now proudly displayed in his living room so he can get a kick out of it any time of day.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome! I name him Sir Plantsalot LoL

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!

All of my friends always comment on it when they see it! I also love the details on the back so you can see the different garden tools used to make his thrones.

Never told her that it was ment for her and when she asked I gave her the link so ya i'm a good guy what can I say? Awesome gnome.

product_meta.title: Big Mouth Inc. Game of Gnomes Garden Gnome – Comical Garden Gnome, Hand-Painted Weatherproof Ceramic Lawn Gnome, Makes a Great Gift, 9.5” Tall
product_meta.description: The BigMouth Inc. Game of Gnomes Garden Gnome is a hilarious must-have for any Game of Thrones fan. The statue of gnomed nature doth lay claim to the territory henceforth known as thy garden. This funny garden gnome has “Game of Gnomes” written on the front and features a gnome sitting upon the Iron Throne. Perfect for a housewarming gag gift or a funny gift anytime, this hand-painted ceramic garden gnome is sure to make your friends and family laugh! It’s a great gift idea for any Game of Thrones fan and will be hilarious in any front yard, garden, office, display shelf or anywhere else a gnome may lurk. Just don’t forget to water your garden or you’ll end up with tumbleweeds. Made of durable cast poly resin, the Game of Gnomes Garden gnome is weatherproof, making it the perfect addition to your garden or lawn. Approximately 9.5 inches tall. Since their breakout at the International Toy Fair in New York in 2004, BigMouth Inc. has been a leading manufacturer of fun, hilarious novelty products for all aspects of life, including vacation, drinkware, holiday gifts, home & office, holidays & special collections, yard decorations, mugs, money cans, and more. BigMouth's continued pursuit of quality has landed the company recognition through a slew of major players, including but not limited to The Tonight Show, Live! with Regis & Kelly, Buzzfeed, Forbes, Cosmo, and Bloomberg. Beware of counterfeits and knockoffs sold by other companies! Only "Sold by" BigMouth Inc. products are guaranteed genuine. Please contact BigMouth Inc. and Amazon immediately if you notice an unscrupulous dealer peddling replicas.
feature_bullets: HILARIOUS GARDEN GNOME: This hilarious garden gnome is a must-have for any Game of Thrones fan. This statue of gnomed nature doth lay claim to the territory henceforth known as thy garden. It’s funny for gardens, offices or anywhere a gnome will lurk.

GAME OF GNOMES: Brace yourself, the weeds are coming. This funny garden gnome has “Game of Gnomes” written on the front and features a gnome sitting upon the Iron Throne. Just don’t forget to water your garden or you’ll end up with tumbleweeds.

MAKES A GREAT GAG GIFT: Perfect for a housewarming gag gift or funny gift anytime, this hand-painted ceramic garden gnome is sure to make your gift recipient laugh! It’s a great gift idea for every Game of Thrones fan.

WEATHERPROOF: Made of durable cast poly resin, the Game of Gnomes garden gnome is weatherproof and can withstand the elements, making it the perfect addition to your garden or lawn. Approximately 9.5 inches tall.
BIGMOUTH INC: We the creative force behind an exclusive line of high-quality, fun novelty items. Our specialty is an assortment of original, humorous products targeting practical jokers of all ages.
